original_title: UFC on Fox 8: Johnson vs. Moraga
overview: UFC on Fox 8: Johnson vs. Moraga was a mixed martial arts event held on July 27, 2013, at the Key Arena in Seattle, Washington. The main event was a UFC Flyweight Championship bout between champion Demetrious Johnson and top contender John Moraga.
title: UFC on Fox 8: Johnson vs. Moraga
